articles.author: Margot Amouyal, Taylor Telford
articles.title: S&P 500 squeaks out record high even as new trade tensions emerge with Canada - The Washington Post
articles.description: The tech-heavy Nasdaq also notched a record finish to help cap Wall Street’s comeback from the tariff-fueled lows of April.
articles.content: U.S. stocks surged to new heights Friday, with the S&P 500 notching a record finish to cap its comeback from the tariff-fueled lows of April as investors looked past renewed trade tensions with C… [+4924 chars]
